name: Mountain Bike Extreme
description:
IT'S TIME TO SHOW OFF YOUR MOTO EXTREME SKILL!
Remember the time you wanted to show off your moto extreme skills in front of girl you got big crush on and then failed? Well,that's embarrassing,you've got practice a lot before that,since you are a super fan of extreme bike and extreme moto sports,now there's a chance for you to practice your skills.
Drive your bike or moto,unleash your inner passion for xtreme sports. This is an exciting and totally free bike racing game! Drive your bike crossing all the obstacles as soon as possible. DON'T FALL DOWN TO THE GROUND!
Launch off an enormous jump, land on your rear wheel and crash your way through a variety of well designed levels. Your reflexes will mean the difference between surviving or crashing in spectacular fashion.
